languages.text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, командир Астра Милитарум получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Astra Militarum Commander's ally uses a Heroic Act, the Commander gains +5 to all their Characteristics until the end of combat.
Every time the Astra Militarum Commander's ally uses a Heroic Act, the Commander gains +5 to all their Characteristics until the end of combat.
Every time the Astra Militarum Commander's ally uses a heroic act, the Commander gains +5 to all of their characteristics until the end of combat.

Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда союзник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, командир Астра Милитарум получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник командира Астра Милитарум совершает героический акт, командир получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.
Когда союзник командира Астра Милитарум совершает героический акт, командир получает +5 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Verbündete des Astra Militarum-Commanders eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt, erhält der Commander bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 auf alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Verbündete des Astra Militarum-Commanders eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} einsetzt, erhält der Commander bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 auf alle seine Eigenschaften.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié du commandant de l'Astra Militarum utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, un bonus de +5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} du commandant jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié du commandant de l'Astra Militarum utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g}, un bonus de +5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} du commandant jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 每当星界军指挥官的盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，指挥官的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当星界军指挥官的盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}时，指挥官的所有属性都会提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado del comandante del Astra Militarum usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, el comandante gana +5 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta que termine el combate.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado del comandante del Astra Militarum usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g}, el comandante gana +5 a todas las características hasta que termine el combate.

languages.text: 帝国防衛軍司令の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用するたび、司令は戦闘終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5される。
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用するたび、司令は戦闘終了まですべての能力が+5される。

languages.text: Astra Militarum komutanının dost birimi bir {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} yaptığında komutan, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +5 kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Every time the Astra Militarum commander's ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the commander gains +5 to all of their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.
